_header: Saint Luke tells how disciples two
_description: Gospel for Easter Monday in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Luc seiþ how disciples twoþat wiþ Ihesu was
                    wont to go…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And makeþ mon slepe for dronknesAnd holde so to for
                    worþnes
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Duo ex discipulis Ihesu ibant in Castellum (f.
                    186rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte luk saise how dissiples twoþat wiþ iesu was wont
                    to go…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde vs schelde fra his stelingeAnd to þe blisse
                    of heuene vs bringe
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Luk telles vs howe disciples tuoþat with ihesu was wonte
                    to go…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And dos þem slepe for dronkonnesAnd bowe donne til
                    forworthnes
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
fferis iia in ebdomade Pasche secundum Lucam (p.
                    180)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Luke seyth how disciplis twoþat with ihesu were wonid
                    for to go…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& makiþ a man slepe for drunkenesand
                    holde so to forworthnes
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
fferia 2a in Ebdomade Pasche Euangelium secundum Lucam
                    (f. 119)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Luke tels how disciples twoþat with ihesu war wont to go…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Oure Lord vs lett fra his lereingAnd vnto blis of heuyn vs bring
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Exeuntes duo ex discipulis ihesu.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia ii proxima secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 88ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.178-184.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint luke sais how disciples twaThat with ihesu was wont to
                    ga…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…To Ierusalem þan torned þayAnd fand þere when
                    þei com thider…
BLAdd38010.Note:
A considerable portion of this text is missing, possibly a whole quire
                    is missing. The text ends abruptly on line 71 of an 174-line verse item, and the
                    next folio goes straight into the the next homily (5675-10).

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint luc saith how dysciplis twoÞat with ihesu ware wont to
                    go…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…God is worde for to hereOure loueryd vs schyld ffro his
                    pychereffor here to lyggyth a lytill taleHow he makyth men drynk
                    gostely dualeþat makyth men slepe ffor drunkenysAnd helde to for
                    worthnys
HunHM129.Note:
This MS ends four lines earlier, with last four above as first four of
                        489.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt luke telles how his discipillis twaþat ware wonte wyth
                    cryste to ga…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…ge gers men slepe for dronkennesand to dwell in mykyll
                    vnworthynes
MinULZ822.Attributed Title: fferia secunda in ebdomada pasche Secundum Lucam (f. 82)
